page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: On a survey of the area we found that most of the housing was of an older design. Some of the smaller cottages being approximately{120 years old}and built by mine owners etc. for their imported workforce. Today there is also a large number of{ {Council Houses}in the area, with only very few transfered to private ownership. The vast majority of houses were built of stone taken from local quarries (there is an old,{diused stone quarry in the north east corner of the survey block). As work began on council homes the emphasis changed from stone to brick work as bricks were readily available from a local brickworks. Very few modern private houses have been built within the block.
